naslov: BEZ PROVIZIJE ! Kuća rohbau, Brštanovo -Klis, 220m2 s okučnicom 6709m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: BEZ PROVIZIJE ! Prodaje se roh-bau kuća u izgradnji u općini Brštanovo, Klis. Kuća ima 208 m2 stvarne korisne površine te 220m2 BRUTO površine.  Okružuje je okućnica 6709m2 od čega je 4025m2 građevinskog zemljišta, a druga parcela, koja je spojena, ulazi u građevinsku zone ove godine. Obje parcele imaju pristupni put. Do završetka rohbau faze još će se dovršiti zapadna strana bazena, spoj bazena i kuće, pristupna rampa na istoku kuće te uređenje okoliša. Nekretnina je prema projektu zamišljena kao kuća za odmor sa četiri zvjezdice te uključuje tri spavaće sobe s kupaonicama, dnevni boravak s kuhinjom, blagovaonicom, ostavom i wc-om, predsoblje te welness dio sa saunom i teretana. Zbog veličine terena i mogućnosti gradnje dodatnih objekata, namjena nekretnine i okoliša ima brojne mogućnosti, golf teren, tenis teren itd. Projekt je uključen u cijenu. U blizini je crnogorična šuma te se kuća nalazi na osami. Od Splita je udaljena 25 minuta vožnje. Ova nekretnina ima izuzetno veliki potencijal i kao takva sa svim popratnim sadržajima, građevinskim projektom, dozvolama se prodaje po cijeni SNIŽENOJ od samo 333.000 EUR. Za sve daljnje informacije nazovite na 00385 91 2304 007 ili poslati mail na : m.anic@remax.hr WITHOUT COMMISSION! For sale is a "roh-bau" house under construction in the municipality of Brštanovo, Klis. The house has 208 m² of actual usable space and 220 m² of GROSS surface area. It is surrounded by a yard of 6709 m², of which 4025 m² is building land, and the second plot, which is connected, will enter the construction zone this year. Both plots have access roads. The completion of the "roh-bau" stage will include finishing the western side of the pool, connecting the pool to the house, building the access ramp on the east side of the house, and landscaping. According to the project, the property is designed as a 4-star vacation house, including three bedrooms with bathrooms, a living room with a kitchen, dining room, pantry, and WC, an entrance hall, and a wellness area with a sauna and gym. Due to the size of the land and the possibility of building additional facilities, the property's purpose and surroundings offer numerous opportunities, such as a golf course, tennis court, etc. The project is included in the price. There is a coniferous forest nearby, and the house is located in a secluded area. It is 25 minutes by car from Split. This property has an exceptionally large potential, and as such, with all accompanying facilities, the building project, and permits, it is being sold at a REDUCED price of only 333,000 EUR. For further information, please call 00385 91 2304 007 or send an email to: m.anic@remax.hr Signing the Remax brokerage agreement is mandatory, in accordance with the Real Estate Brokerage Act, regardless of the fact that the property is being sold WITHOUT COMMISSION!
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
